English: Road to Malsk
Early morning
Your training report did not lie. You possess some serious skill and talent, comrade Kukushkin.\nAnd I don't say that just to everybody.
Your words are kind, comrade Frolov. I'm just doing my best.
Continue on this path and you might get far. You do seem ambitious and craving of higher status and recognition.
Comrade Frolov, I've been nothing my whole life. For once, I feel like I do belong somewhere and that I am useful.
That is good, but don't get ambition get into your head. Always stay with both legs firmly on the ground.
Leading a tank platoon is a team effort.\nEven exceptional leaders have to be surrounded by good people, otherwise they're just average.
Keep that in mind and you'll do marvellously.
Thank you, comrade Frolov, I'll remember that.
That's the signal. Everyone, to your positions!
YURY TO ALL UNITS. WE'RE CLOSING IN ON MALSK. TO ALL UNITS, ATTACK! OUT.
BAZA TO ALL UNITS, GOOD WORK, ENEMY DEFENCES ARE BROKEN. THE INFANTRY SHOULD CLEAR THE BASE FROM STRAGGLERS AND THE TANKS SHOULD PREPARE TO HOLD IT. THE ENEMY COUNTERATTACK IS COMING. BAZA OUT.
YELENA TO YURY, WE ARE COMING TO SUPPORT YOU. OUT.
DMITRY TO YURY, WE'RE GOING TO MINE THE ROAD AND KEEP AN EYE ON THE TANKS. WE'LL LET YOU KNOW WHEN THEY'RE COMING.
DMITRY TO YURY, THE ATTACK IS HERE AND IT'S BAD. A FEW LIGHT TANKS IN THE BACK BUT THE CHARGE IS LED BY A HEAVY TANK PLATOON. HOPEFULLY THE MINES WILL DO THEIR WORK. GET READY, YURY!
BAZA TO ALL UNITS. GOOD WORK. THE ENEMY IS RETREATING. WE HAVE WON A GREAT VICTORY TODAY, COMRADES! BAZA OUT.
Yelena
Dmitry
Enemy counterattack
Infantry
Hold
Mines
